category.description: An entry for a single category.

id.description: A unique ID for the category. Recommended format is a dot-separated list of categories that are parents of this category, followed by a unique value for this category. Must be URL safe.

name.description: The display name for the category.

most_popular.description: Indicates if the category should show up in the initial list of categories, or only in the full expanded list.

priority.description: Indicates sort order for categories that are marked as most popular.

children.description: A list of categories that are children of this category.
